com.mobius.vdrapi
Interface IPageNote

public interface IPageNote

A class implements IPageNote to indicate that it contains a PageNote.

Method Summary
 String getCreatedBy()
          Returns the user ID of the user that created the PageNote.
 Date getCreatedOn()
          Returns the date and time that the PageNote was created on.
 String getText()
          Returns the text of the PageNote.
 String getUpdatedBy()
          Returns the user ID of the user that last updated the PageNote.
 Date getUpdatedOn()
          Returns the date and time that the PageNote was last updated on.
 void setText(String textIn)
          Modifies the text of the PageNote.
